resources.string: Jon Snow, born Aegon Targaryen, is the son of Lyanna Stark and Rhaegar Targaryen, the late Prince of Dragonstone.

In the Game of Thrones television series, Jon\'s storyline follows the character\'s plot arc from the novel series, though seasons 6â€“8 continue on from the events of Martin\'s latest published installment, detailing Jon\'s resurrection, and revealing him to have been born Aegon Targaryen, the legitimate son of Rhaegar Targaryen.
